text: Sɛʋɛ ɠɛ nui Semaya, Netaneyɛle ná-doun zunui, nii é ɠɛni ga Levi mavofodai ta, naa ti-laaseigiti sɛʋɛni masagi ɠaazu, ta totuɠɔiti, naa ʋɛɛ zalaɠa ɠula nui Sadɔke, ta Aɓiataal ná-doun zunui Ayimelɛke ʋa, ta zalaɠa ɠula nui naa ʋɛɛ Levi nuiti ta-ʋɛlɛyeɠe lotuɠɔiti ba. Ti ɠɛni kɛɛzu ga seɠezeɠedai, ta la pɛlɛyeɠe ɠila seɠena Eleazaal nɔnɔiti saama, ti gila seɠe Itamaal nɔnɔiti saama.
